scripts.seed: node seeder -b -i && node seeder -c -i && node seeder -u -i && node seeder -r -i
scripts.destroy: node seeder -c -d && node seeder -b -d && node seeder -u -d && node seeder -r -d
scripts.dns: node seeder -c -d && node seeder -b -d && node seeder -u -d && node seeder -r -d && node seeder -b -i && node seeder -c -i && node seeder -u -i && node seeder -r -i
